First Aid traveler's medical care for every eventuality, for every traveler.

Having travel insurance protects you in case of illness or injury during your trip in Riviera Maya. It also provides key medical benefits in case of an emergency.

That’s why at First Aid we offer travel policies that includes major medical coverage to protect you and your family´s  health.

Our travel medical coverage is ideal for:

  • International vacationers.
  • Digital Nomads.
  • Exchange Students.
  • Families with children.
  • Business travelers.
  • Excursion groups.

Medical Assistance

First Aid offers the best health assistance plan in Cancún & Riviera Maya:

MEDICAL CHEK-UPS

General Doctor y Specialists Doctor Check-up.

IMAGING

Radiography, Torax Tele Radiology, Ultrasound, etc.

MEDICAL CHEK-UPS

General Urine Test, Febrile Reactions, Simple Parasites, Hematic Biometry, etc.

EMERGENCY ROOM

Intoxications, Lumbar Pain, Minor Cardiac Estabilization, Unexposed Fracture, etc.

COVID-19
DETECTION TEST

Inmunologic Test IgG/IgM (Presenting fever and other symptoms)

Ask for other minor medical services. Will be

What to do in case of emergency?

We can help immediately if you have an emergency during your vacations. 

MORE INFO

LOCATION

With our Health Plan, if you suffer any accident or emergency during your trip to Cancun or Riviera Maya, you can be treated in any of our hospitals throughout Quintana Roo.

IDENTIFICATION

When you arrive at one of our hospitals, you will have to present your official identification (INE or Passport), to prove your identity and make the Medical Care Policy effective.

DIAGNOSIS

For your diagnosis, the General Physician will perform a check-up to determine if you need a specialist check-up, lab tests or some type of X-ray to reinforce or confirm the diagnosis and follow up during your recovery.

LABORATORY

The Travel Medical Care Policy will cover the medical studies requested by the General Practitioner, from Laboratory Analysis, Imaging, etc. to achieve a proper diagnosis.

COVID-19 TEST

If during your trip to the Mexican Caribbean, you present symptoms of Covid-19, you can request a test in one of our hospitals. Depending on the diagnosis, the corresponding protocol will be established.

  • Why Do I Need
    FirstAid Travel
    Medical Insurance?

Traveling unprotected to Cancun, Playa del Carmen, etc. can leave you vulnerable to paying high out-of-pocket medical expenses and navigating a foreign healthcare system without the assistance you need.

However, with a Travel Healthcare Plan, you can worry less and experience more knowing you have medical coverage and a trusted healthcare advisor who can support you in your time of need.

Less than $15 USD per week for an average plan.

Like other travelers, you may be wondering if the coverage is worth the cost. It may surprise you to learn that First Aid Travel Medical Plans can cost less than $15 USD per week (based on an average plan) and can provide coverage worth well beyond your initial cost. Check out our special promotions!

FAQ's

Where can I check my policy?
After processing your payment, you will receive a copy of your policy by email.
Can I extend the term of my policy?
No, but you can buy another for as long as necessary.
Does my nationality or my age matter?
No, any duly identified person will be treated within the clinics and hospitals in our network.
What does my policy not includes?
Hospitalization, surgeries, routine tests, cosmetic interventions, medications outside the office.
Can I have several inquiries during my trip?
Yes, while the policy is active, all the required check-ups and requested by the doctor can by made, as well as the laboratory analysis and X-rays that are required during the term of the policy.
Is there any coverage against COVID-19?
If you have a fever and other know symptoms, you may go to the PlayaMed clinics located in Cancun and Playa del Carmen to see the General Doctor who will determine if it is necessary to take the COVID-19 test or some other laboratory test. Just the test is included.

No one plans to get sick on their vacations!

We are the perfect option for travelers & tourists who are
visiting the Riviera for a short period.
